name: Clarity (alexsussy)
description:
A lone traveller is lost at sea, and must find objects in the ocean to help them recall who and where they are. Travel along your map and collect a combination of 5 lost object cards that add up to a high enough total of clarity. Do so before you run out of hearts or motivation, else you may be lost forever.

Credits:
Cole O'Brien, Alex Sussman, Sadie Saunders, Andrea Cabral, Beau Pirrone, Richard Hanneman, Kris Kneisley, Alejandro Espinosa
